p:
In this study, the three sources of evidence are combined via an iterative procedure in order to identify for each lattice point the ‘degree of belief’ we have in the likely occurrence of H5N1. To simplify the text we have referred to this as the “risk”. Thailand, for example, is represented by a matrix 3088
1738 lattice points. Figure S1(c) shows the integrated result of the H5N1 epidemic in Thailand. Dempster's combination procedure is demonstrated for Thailand in Table S2.
